data.author: finebyte

changelog.release_notes:
- Enable B&W custom images for Pebble2/Diorite
- Enable Analog Clock for Pebble2/Diorite

Glance 2.12 For Glance Android 0.20
- Added offset to pin manager (puts pins into future) for SDK4.0 compatibilty
- Added UKTrain flip time (automatically changes direction at a set 24h time)
- Added Custom AppGlance (Experimental)
-- Adds an AppGlance using same format as Customized Layouts Labels, e.g. #PHONE_SMS is the SMS Count)
-- Will only update when Glance is run on your Pebble
- Added QuickExit Timer
-- Exit Glance after a short period. Useful for just looking at a data screen or layout
- Improved menu caching on the Pebble

Requires Glance Android 0.19
Newer Pebbles Only:
- Increased number of layers for Custom Layouts (EXPERIMENTAL)
- Background Color for Custom Layouts
-- Use the Star button on a layout to set a background color
- Hour Offsets
-- After a time format add +/-n for offset hours/minutes
-- e.g. %R+1 or %I:%M+30
- Added Calorie based Pebble Health Fields
- Added formatter (star button) to control weather image type
-- (Black and white, colour, colour with border)
All Pebbles:
- Customise QuickLaunch Mapping
-- When Glance is launched from QuickLaunch it can open a specific screen.
- Added LECO font
- Added temperature conversion functions F_TO_C C_TO_F K_TO_C K_TO_F
-- e.g. #F_TO_C #TEMP_MAX would convert whatever comes from TEMP_MAX from Fahrenheit to Celsius
- Added more location caching (potential fix to issues with Android 6 Doze/App Standby)
Bugfix disappearing layers on custom faces, InverterLayer bug

Glance 2.2 for Android app 0.16 - Experimental Pin Support - add Stocks, UKTrains, RSS & JSON to your timeline! - New default bg colour for Pebble Time - Override bg and fg colors for defaults on Pebble Time - New Colour weather icons for Pebble Time

Updated to SDK 3.0 (FINAL)
Added AnalogPlus Preset for PebbleTime
Latest version of Glance and Glance for Time

data.description: Glance provides information and SMS messaging straight from your pebble. Watch screens show weather and unread message counts. Read and respond to SMS messages. Get Train times, Bus times, Stock Prices and launch other Pebble apps all at the click of a button! With Premium Edit your own watchfaces with a wealth of information. Pebble Time adds color presets and images in the editor. Now with Dictation for SMS Messages!

latest_release.release_notes:
- Enable B&W custom images for Pebble2/Diorite
- Enable Analog Clock for Pebble2/Diorite

data.title: Glance
